header: Edom Will Not Let Israel Pass

verse: From Kadesh, Moses sent messengers to the king of Edom. He said, “Your brothers, the Israelites, say to you: You know about all the ·troubles [hardship] we have had,

We will travel only along the ·king’s road [King’s Highway; a north-south international highway], not turning right or left until we have passed through your ·country [boundaries].”
